price: Ó sọ Tírà (al-Ƙur’ān) kalẹ̀ fún ọ pẹ̀lú òdodo, ó ń fi ohun tó jẹ́ òdodo rinlẹ̀ nípa èyí tó wà ṣíwájú rẹ̀. Ó sì sọ at-Taorāh àti al-’Injīl kalẹ̀.
arabic: نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَأَنزَلَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: nazzala ʿalayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi wa-anzala al-tawrāta wal-injīla
